name: sequelize-typescript-generator
description: Automatically generates typescript models compatible with sequelize-typescript library (https://www.npmjs.com/package/sequelize-typescript) directly from your source database.

scripts.test-mysql: npm run docker-remove-containers && npm run docker-start-mysql && jest src/tests/integration/mysql
scripts.test-mariadb: npm run docker-remove-containers && npm run docker-start-mariadb && jest src/tests/integration/mariadb
scripts.test-postgres: npm run docker-remove-containers && npm run docker-start-postgres && jest src/tests/integration/postgres
scripts.test-mssql: npm run docker-remove-containers && npm run docker-start-mssql && jest src/tests/integration/mssql
scripts.test: npm run test-sqlite && npm run test-mysql && npm run test-mariadb && npm run test-postgres && npm run test-mssql
scripts.dev: npx ts-node-dev src/bin/cli.ts -D mysql -u root -x mysql -d dbtest --dialect-options '{"timezone": "local"}' --case const:camel --clean --logs

author: Ludovico Fabbri
